name: High School Fun: Gangster 3D
description:
High school Fun game is all about the crazy actions one can perform at the teen’s school. Live high school life and take revenge from the gang in this Fun school game, plan your escape in different challenging situations. Smash everything & strike, run with high school girlfriends and boyfriends in this game. Fight the principal & dodge him. You are the best high school gangster on the campus, plan your survival at nights. Steal bags of the students, have fun with the teachers and hall monitors patrolling the city school corridor. Hit them hard with your strike weapons.
Steal the homework of the fellow students. Break the security lockers in search of different tasks, steal the exam papers from the principal's office and sneak from the corridor, bypass the hall monitor of the school and don’t get caught in the way by cameras. Face the bullies of the school and save your friend from beating, throw rocks and papers, don’t seek too much attention to yourself and stop anyone from complaining to the principal about your secret hunts of the crazy adventure in this High School Fun Game. You have been caught into the detention as punishment for your disciplinary actions, sneak and escape from the office while the teacher is sleeping, destroying the cameras of the campus to erase any footage of your crime recordings. Be the vicious criminal in high school and get ready for some great fun of your life.
Key Features:
- High-End School 3D Graphics.
- Fun missions of school life.
- Exciting and challenging gameplay.
- Stunning & High-Quality 3D Graphics
- Smooth, Easy & Intuitive Controls
